text: khlq allah alsmwat wal'ard wama fihima balhq, yaji' biallayl wayudhhib balnhar, wyjy' bialnahar wayudhhib ballyl, wdhllal alshams walqamar biaintizam lmnafe alebad, kl minhuma yajri fi mdarh 'iilaa hin qiam alsae. 'ala 'iina allah aladhi faeal hadhih alafeal, wanem ealaa khalaqah bhdhh alnaeam hu aleaziz ealaa khlqh, alghafaar ldhnwb eibadih altaybyn
